description: A female moose, adorned in a yellow dress and hair rollers, stands talking on a wall-mounted rotary phone. Beside her, a male moose with large antlers reclines in a green armchair, holding a red beverage can and watching a television set with rabbit ears. The setting is a typical domestic living room, complete with a window and potted plant. This surreal depiction places wild animals into a mundane human environment, highlighting the absurdity of their domesticated lifestyle. The juxtaposition of this scene with the concept of 'the wild' creates sharp irony.
caption: “It’s the call of the wild.”
